title: Reverse Words in a Sentence
description: Write a function `reverse_words` that takes a string as input and returns the same string with the words reversed (i.e., each word is written in reverse order). The sentence may contain letters, numbers, spaces, commas, periods, and question marks. Words are separated by any number of whitespace characters.
tests: assert reverse_words('I am learning Python') == 'tnap ym I ma lrehtyP'
